title: Jonathan Ashworth – 2021 Comments on Workplace Testing
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jonathan Ashworth, the Shadow Health Secretary, on 7 February 2021.
content: Extra workplace testing is welcome but so much more needs to be done to make workplaces Covid-secure including improving ventilation and upgraded PPE standards.
This is even more important when the most recent data shows hundreds of outbreaks in workplaces since the start of January.
